title: Serverless Data Warehouse ETL Workflow
description: A Step Functions Workflow extracts, transforms, and loads data from various sources into a serverless data warehouse for analytics

introBox.headline: Serverless Data Warehouse ETL Workflow
text: In this workflow, a Glue ETL job takes a JSON file as an input from S3 and then transforms one of the field name. Together with the transformation, required data catalog is created and data is inserted to Redshift serverless datawarehouse by running Glue Connectors.

testing.headline: Testing
text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Serda Kasaci Yildirim
authors.bio: Serda is a Solutions Architect at Amazon Web Services (AWS) based in Vienna, Austria.
